body: Billionaire Donald Trump is currently at the top of national polls of the GOP presidential primary  Business mogul Donald Trump is already looking forward to a possible 2020 presidential run ... against rapper Kanye West. "He's actually a different kind of a person than people think. He's a nice guy," Trump told Rolling Stone in an interview published Wednesday. "I hope to run against him someday." Trump told Rolling Stone that he saw West's announcement Sunday during an awards show that rapper intends to run for president in 2020, and found it "very interesting," adding, "I wonder who gave him that idea?" "Somehow there are comparisons made so often -- which is interesting -- comparisons with Kanye and myself. I don't quite get it," Trump said. Read more: [Kanye West says he will ‘run for president.’ Because politics is entertainment.] [Kanye West’s flirtation with a 2020 run generates online buzz that he could partner with Donald Trump.]
title: Donald Trump is ready to run against Kanye in 2020
